summary: THE ABS MODULE HAS GONE OUT AND WILL COST $100 TO GET FIXED.  THERE IS NO RECALL DUE TO THE FACT THAT NO ONE HAS DIED YET.  I GUESS THE CONCEPT HERE IS THE POPULATION IS EXPENDABLE AND GM CAN PRODUCE LOW QUALITY PARTS.  I HAVE ALSO HAD TO REPLACE MY BATTERY BECAUSE OF THIS PROBLEM.  I HAVE ALWAYS PREFERRED CHEVROLET TRUCKS, BUT I HAVE CHANGED MY MIND BECAUSE OF THIS AND ANOTHER INCIDENT.   *JB
